post.text: Donald Trump made millions in Atlantic City while bankrupting his businesses, laying off his workers, and stiffing his contractors. Here's how.

comment.author: Alexis
comment.text: Under 18 USC 793 Sub-Section (f) Paragraph (2).., NO CRIMINAL INTENT IS REQUIRED...The only requirement is to HAVE KNOWLEDGE. Hillary Clinton in fact had knowledge of what she was doing as well as others.....(f) Whoever, being entrusted with or having lawful possession or control of any document, writing, code book, signal book, sketch, photograph, photographic negative, blueprint, plan, map, model, instrument, appliance, note, or information, relating to the national defense, (1) through gross negligence permits the same to be removed from its proper place of custody or delivered to anyone in violation of his trust, or to be lost, stolen, abstracted, or destroyed, or (2) having knowledge that the same has been illegally removed from its proper place of custody or delivered to anyone in violation of its trust, or lost, or stolen, abstracted, or destroyed, and fails to make prompt report of such loss, theft, abstraction, or destruction to his superior officerâ€” Shall be fined under this title or imprisoned not more than ten years, or both....This EXCUSE fails Miserably !!!

replies.text: The most corrupted politician in history. No surprise.... Knew crooked Hillary would get away with it. Gen,Patreous's career was ruined for far less. So the FBI just rewrote a statue that although it wasn't right what she did, she really had no intent of doing harm to the USA. So they rigged it to let her off the hook. replies.author: Hunter
replies.text: Distortions distortions distortions. Lies lies lies. Anyway, you're probably part of the clean-up damage control mob. What they do is round up artificial "likes" by numbers. "Like jacking" they call it.
